name: BOOK OF PRAYERS
description:
There exists a place and sometimes its dark. Just dark. There is nothing there except for a mess of things that don't make sense. And you don't make sense either, when you're there. But sometimes it's not dark. It's water. It's sound and light and ooze. It's a medium. And there's a voice. 

Twine interactive fiction. 

  • Learn how to pray
  • Cast a powerful curse
  • Speak to a darker power
  • Find the secret ending
Cover art by Square
